adorablehamsterpets.main.autoHealFoods.d: The specific items a hamster will eat directly from its cheek pouch to heal itself when injured. Keep it exclusive, or let them feast on enchanted apples. Your call.
adorablehamsterpets.main.buffFoods.desc: The list of questionable substances that grant your hamster temporary superpowers. By default, it's just steamed green beans.
adorablehamsterpets.main.cheeseHealing.d: Ser... kleista rozkosz. Niektórzy uważają, że jest zbyt potężny. Ja się z tym nie zgadzam.
adorablehamsterpets.main.cheeseNutrition: Ile głodowych pałeczek przywraca ser. Zwykły pieczony stek ma 8. Ale już kombinujesz, żeby dać 20, co nie, cwaniaku?.
adorablehamsterpets.main.cheeseSaturatio: Jak długo utrzymuje się efekt sytości. Pieczony stek ma 0.8. Nie szalej za bardzo. Albo i szalej. Nie jestem twoim sumieniem.
adorablehamsterpets.main.cleaningChanceD: Jak często siedzący chomik dostaje nagły impuls do umycia się. To szansa 1 na X na tick – niższa liczba to wyższa szansa. Na przykład 1200 oznacza średnio raz na minutę. 300 ≈ co 15 sek, a 5000 ≈ co 4 min. Gratulacje — właśnie zdobyłeś wiedzę, która może być niebezpieczna.
adorablehamsterpets.main.combat.desc: Najpierw pisk, potem pytania. Skonfiguruj gryzoniowe kung-fu.
adorablehamsterpets.main.cooldowns.desc: Związek zawodowy chomików wymaga przerwy po każdym akcie odwagi. I ciasteczek.
adorablehamsterpets.main.core.desc: Fundamentalne wygłupy chomików — zmieniaj te ustawienia na własną odpowiedzialność.
adorablehamsterpets.main.cucumberBushBio: ID biomów, w których ogórek może się rozwijać. Formatuj 'mod_id:nazwa_biomu', na przykład: 'minecraft_savanna'.
adorablehamsterpets.main.cucumberBushCon: Convention tags for maximum mod-pack harmony. Format: 'c:tag_name', for example: 'c:is_temperate'.
adorablehamsterpets.main.cucumberBushExc: Biomes where cucumbers are absolutely NOT allowed. Overrides everything else. Format: 'mod_id:biome_name', for example: 'minecraft:ocean'.
adorablehamsterpets.main.cucumberBushSet: Wild cucumbers, for when you need emergency salads in the savanna. Only changes fresh chunks.
adorablehamsterpets.main.cucumberBushTag: Tagi biomów, gdzie ogórki czują się jak w domu. Format: 'mod_id:tag_name', for example: 'minecraft:is_jungle'.
adorablehamsterpets.main.desc: Ustawienia, które może powinny zostać ukryte
adorablehamsterpets.main.diamondPounceCh: Prawdopodobieństwo (0.1 do 1.0), że chomik ulegnie pokusie. Domyślnie wysokie. A tak w ogóle, to lepiej nie zostawiaj diamentów na podłodze.
adorablehamsterpets.main.diamondSeekRadi: Jak daleko chomik skanuje, gdy poczuje zew bycia poszukiwaczem skarbów.
adorablehamsterpets.main.diamondStealing: For when your hamster develops a taste for the finer things in life. Can be configured so they steal any item— even from other mods, but they only steal diamonds by default.
adorablehamsterpets.main.dismountOrder.d: Determines the sequence for dismounting hamsters with a key press. LIFO (Last-In, First-Out) dismounts the most recently added hamster. FIFO (First-In, First-Out) dismounts the oldest one.
adorablehamsterpets.main.dismountPressTy: Choose whether a single press or a quick double‑tap dismounts the hamster.
adorablehamsterpets.main.dismountTrigger: Choose what action dismounts the hamster. 'SNEAK_KEY' uses your sneak key, obviously. 'CUSTOM_KEYBIND' uses a separate key you must set in Controls > Key Binds.
adorablehamsterpets.main.doubleTapDelayT: Max time between sneak key presses to count as a double-tap. (20 ticks = 1 second)
adorablehamsterpets.main.enableAutoGuide: Hand-delivers the sacred texts on first login. Read it—or don’t. I'm not your conscience.
adorablehamsterpets.main.enableDiamondSt: Permits hamsters to engage in spontaneous, high-stakes games of keep-away with your valuables. A chase ensues. Obviously.
adorablehamsterpets.main.enableDynamicSh: If true, hamsters on your shoulder will randomly cycle through standing, sitting, and laying down while on the shoulder. If false, they will remain in a single state defined below.
adorablehamsterpets.main.enableHamsterTh: Do we yeet the hamster? ('G' by default).
adorablehamsterpets.main.enableIndepende: Force a cool-down after striking it rich. Off by default, since this can't happen again anyway without another mount/dismount on the shoulder.
Permit hamsters to embark on solo get-rich-quick schemes?
adorablehamsterpets.main.enableItemToolt: Helpful whispers on what the heck that cucumber is for.
adorablehamsterpets.main.enableJadeHamst: More stats than anyone asked for. Defaults to off—mercifully.
adorablehamsterpets.main.enableRavagerFl: Should Ravagers, the hulking beasts of destruction, flee in terror from a tiny ball of fluff? Yes. Yes, they should.
adorablehamsterpets.main.enableShoulderC: Może uratować twój ekwipunek. Lub twoje uszy.
adorablehamsterpets.main.enableShoulderD: Because who doesn’t enjoy unsolicited financial advice from a rodent?
Little status mumbles when your co-pilot disembarks.
adorablehamsterpets.main.enableSpiderFle: Turns your hamster into a mobile arachnid-repellent unit. Highly effective.
adorablehamsterpets.main.excludeBiomes.d: A list of specific biome IDs to NEVER allow spawns in, even if they match a tag. This overrides all other settings. Format: 'mod_id:biome_name'. For example, 'minecraft:plains'.
adorablehamsterpets.main.foodHealing.des: Nutrition— isn't it wonderful. Tweaks to snacks.
adorablehamsterpets.main.forceLayDownOnS: If true, shoulder hamsters will be forced into their 'laying down' animation while you sprint, as if holding on for dear life. If false, they will continue their normal animation cycle.
adorablehamsterpets.main.forceLayDownOnW: False by default. If true, shoulder hamsters will be forced into their 'laying down' animation when you move, as if trying not to fall off. If false, they will continue their normal animation cycle.
adorablehamsterpets.main.forcedShoulderS: If dynamic animations are disabled, choose the single state shoulder pets should remain in. Sometimes this setting can have a delay before kicking in, but if it doesn't seem to be working at all, try switching the 'Forced State' from one option to another. Usually this just makes it "work." I'm not sure why lol
adorablehamsterpets.main.giveGuideBook.d: Misplaced your invaluable tome of rodent wisdom? Click here. I won't tell anyone.
adorablehamsterpets.main.goldMistakeChan: Szansa (0.0 do 1.0) na to, że chomik będzie szukał złota zamiast diamentów, ale, tylko gdy ma oba w zasięgu. 0.5 to jak rzut monetą, a przy 1.0 masz gwarancję, że znalezione diamenty będą złote.
adorablehamsterpets.main.greenBeanBuffAm: Extra fluff padding for those daring dives.
Because someone has to go fast.
adorablehamsterpets.main.greenBeanBuffDu: Steamed beans: power that fades faster than your attention span.
Nutrition, but make it dramatic. Tweaks to caffeine-bean highs.
adorablehamsterpets.main.greenBeanBushBi: Specific biomes where beans sprout like gossip in chat. Format: 'mod_id:biome_name', for example: 'minecraft:swamp'.
adorablehamsterpets.main.greenBeanBushCo: Convention tags for mod-friendly bean spam. Format: 'c:tag_name', for example: 'c:is_wet'.
adorablehamsterpets.main.greenBeanBushEx: Absolutely no beans here, thank you very much. Overrides all other settings. Format: 'mod_id:biome_name', for example: 'minecraft:beach'.
adorablehamsterpets.main.greenBeanBushSe: Legumes with attitude. Tuned for that perfect mid-game caffeine hit. Only changes fresh chunks.
adorablehamsterpets.main.greenBeanBushTa: Biome tags for bean growth. Empty by default—choose wisely. Format: 'mod_id:tag_name', for example: 'minecraft:is_jungle'.
adorablehamsterpets.main.hamsterFoodMixH: Healing amount from Hamster Food Mix. The good stuff.
adorablehamsterpets.main.hamsterThrowCoo: Time-out after using your living projectile. (20 ticks = 1 s)
adorablehamsterpets.main.hamsterThrowDam: Damage dealt by thrown hamster. Surprisingly effective against Creepers. How convenient.
adorablehamsterpets.main.hamsterThrowVel: The base throw speed of your furry projectile.
The throw speed of your furry projectile when under the influence of Steamed Green Beans. Goes from 'yeet' to 'yote'.
adorablehamsterpets.main.includeBiomes.d: A list of specific biome IDs to ALWAYS allow spawns in, even if they don't match the tags above. Format: 'mod_id:biome_name'. For example, 'minecraft:plains'.
adorablehamsterpets.main.independentDiam: Unleash free-range prospectors. What could go wrong?
adorablehamsterpets.main.independentOreS: Cooldown before your hamster can go on another treasure hunt. (20 ticks = 1 s)
adorablehamsterpets.main.itemTags.desc: For the advanced user who looks at a perfectly functional system and thinks, 'I can make this weirder.' Edit these lists to change what items your hamsters consider food, bait, treasure, and all other interactions. Use item IDs (e.g., 'minecraft:diamond') or tags (e.g., '#minecraft:fishes'). Mess it up? That's a you problem.
adorablehamsterpets.main.joinDiscord.des: Join 'The Hamster Pouch' official Discord server. A place to share screenshots, get support, or just witness the ongoing development chaos. You're invited.
adorablehamsterpets.main.maxFleeDistance: The maximum distance before the hamster gets bored and stops running to taunt you.
adorablehamsterpets.main.maxGroupSize.de: Maximum hamsters per spawn group. Because sometimes one just isn't cute enough.
adorablehamsterpets.main.maxStealDuratio: The longest your cardio session can last before the hamster's attention span gives out.
adorablehamsterpets.main.meleeDamage.des: Tamed hamster melee damage. Mostly for show, let's be honest.
adorablehamsterpets.main.minStealDuratio: The shortest amount of time the hamster will entertain this little game before getting bored and dropping your stuff.
adorablehamsterpets.main.mobInteractions: Configure how hamsters interact with (or terrify) other creatures.
adorablehamsterpets.main.pouchAllowedIte: A specific list of items and tags that are allowed in the hamster's cheek pouch. You can add things to this list to bypass the default 'no tools or big blocks' rule, since this overrides the 'disallowed' settings.
adorablehamsterpets.main.pouchDisallowed: A list of specific item IDs that are NEVER allowed in the cheek pouch, unless they are on the 'Allowed' list above. Mostly stuff that's too big, too pointy, or just plain illogical. Lol.
A list of item tags that are NEVER allowed in the cheek pouch, unless they are on the 'Allowed' list above. A broad-spectrum approach to preventing your hamster from swallowing an entire sword.
adorablehamsterpets.main.pouchRestrictio: Fine-tune exactly what your hamster is (and isn't) allowed to carry. The 'Allowed' list acts as a high-priority override to the 'Disallowed' lists and general rules.
adorablehamsterpets.main.pouchUnlockFood: The one-time offering required to earn a hamster's ultimate trust, unlocking their cheek inventory. Make it something special. Or don't. See if I care.
adorablehamsterpets.main.repeatableFoods: Items on this list are so delicious, your hamster will never refuse them, even if you feed it to them twice. For the truly spoiled rodent.
adorablehamsterpets.main.reportBug.desc: Found a game-breaking issue? Or a hamster phasing through the floor? Let me know on Github. The more details, the better. And believe it or not, I do check this frequently.
adorablehamsterpets.main.requireFoodMixT: Require Food Mix to Unlock Cheeks
Gate cheek-pouch storage behind gourmet cuisine, because drama.
adorablehamsterpets.main.shoulder.desc: Change how the fuzzy parrot of doom whispers danger—and diamonds—into your ear.
adorablehamsterpets.main.shoulderAnimati: Control how lively your shoulder-mounted companions are. I mean, I don't like to toot my own horn or anything, but this is pretty great. Now please excuse me while I bask in my humility.
adorablehamsterpets.main.shoulderAudio.d: For when the squeaks become... a bit much.
adorablehamsterpets.main.shoulderCore.de: Just the basic stuff. You know, detecting creepers, sniffing diamonds. Just average Minecraft stuff really. No big deal. Why are you clapping and squealing? Stop that. You look silly.
adorablehamsterpets.main.shoulderDiamond: How close you need to be before the squeak says "bling."
adorablehamsterpets.main.shoulderDismoun: Here's where you decide how to get the little rascals off your shoulders. Warning: they can be clingy.
adorablehamsterpets.main.shoulderMaxStat: The maximum time (in seconds) a shoulder hamster will stay in any one animation state (standing, sitting, or laying down). A random duration between the min and max is chosen for each transition.
adorablehamsterpets.main.shoulderMinStat: The minimum time (in seconds) a shoulder hamster will stay in any one animation state (standing, sitting, or laying down). A random duration between the min and max is chosen for each transition.
adorablehamsterpets.main.shoulderMountFo: The specific item that convinces a tamed hamster your shoulder is the best seat in the house. Defaults to cheese, because of course it does.
adorablehamsterpets.main.silencePhysicsS: Mutes the hamster landing/bounce sound effect from the physics simulation when you are in first-person view.
adorablehamsterpets.main.silenceShoulder: Mutes the ambient squeaks from shoulder-mounted hamsters. The bounce and alert sounds will still play.
adorablehamsterpets.main.spawnBiomeConve: A list of 'c:' convention biome tags where hamsters can spawn. Used for broad mod compatibility. By default, this includes most overworld tags as a 'catch-all', and the filtering for different hamster variants in each biome is hard coded.
A list of biome tags where hamsters can spawn. Format: 'mod_id:tag_name'. For example, 'minecraft:is_forest'.
adorablehamsterpets.main.spawnWeight.des: Adjusts hamster spawn frequency. Higher = more chaos. 1 = blissful silence.
adorablehamsterpets.main.standardFoodHea: Healing from basic seeds/crops. Better than nothing… probably.
adorablehamsterpets.main.standardFoods.d: The hamster's everyday menu. These items will heal them or, if they're at full health, might give them... ideas about starting a family. Don't make it weird.
adorablehamsterpets.main.stealCooldownTi: Mandatory time-out after a successful heist to prevent serial kleptomania. (20 ticks = 1s). WARNING: Increasing this cooldown can dramatically change the diamond stealing mechanic, since that AI goal sometimes re-runs multiple times in a row when the hamster has trouble pathfinding to the item that it wants to steal. So instead of increasing this, you should probably just stop dropping your diamonds on the ground everywhere, butter fingers.
A list of item IDs hamsters find irresistible. Format: 'mod_id:item_id'. Example: 'minecraft:diamond'.
adorablehamsterpets.main.steamedGreenBea: When the sugar rush ends, force a breather. (20 ticks = 1 s)
adorablehamsterpets.main.sunflowerBiomeT: A list of biome tags where these custom Sunflowers can replace vanilla ones. The 'c:is_plains' tag provides wide compatibility with modded biomes.
adorablehamsterpets.main.sunflowerBiomes: Specific biome IDs where these sunflowers can replace the vanilla ones. Format: 'mod_id:biome_name'. They’re picky.
adorablehamsterpets.main.sunflowerRegrow: Higher = slower, lower = faster. Makes perfect sense.
adorablehamsterpets.main.sunflowerSettin: Custom sunflowers, because the vanilla ones just weren’t fabulous enough. Only changes fresh chunks.
adorablehamsterpets.main.tamedQuiescentS: Maximum seconds before the inevitable deep snooze.
Minimum seconds before a sitting hamster gets sleepy.
adorablehamsterpets.main.tamedSleepSetti: Even digital rodents need beauty sleep— adjust according to your patience levels.
adorablehamsterpets.main.tamedSleepThrea: How close a hostile mob can get before a hamster wakes up from it's power nap.
adorablehamsterpets.main.tamingAndBreedi: Convince a hamster to love you—and occasionally accept a roommate.
adorablehamsterpets.main.tamingChanceDen: Taming difficulty (1 in X chance). Higher = more cucumbers sacrificed to fuzzy freeloaders.
adorablehamsterpets.main.tamingFoods.des: The official list of bribes for convincing wild fluffballs to join your cause. By default, it's just sliced cucumbers. Feel free to add 'minecraft:nether_star' if you enjoy making poor life choices. Compatible with Cultural Delights by default!
Changes the default entity name from 'Hamster' to 'Hampter'. Note: This has no visible effect in vanilla Minecraft, as mobs don't show nameplates by default. It's primarily for use with mods like Auto Leveling that display entity names.
adorablehamsterpets.main.visitWebsite.de: Shameless plug for my other, less-rodent-focused work. Click if you dare.
adorablehamsterpets.main.wildBushRegrowt: Higher = slower, lower = faster. Still makes perfect sense.
adorablehamsterpets.main.wildCucumberBus: 1 in X chunks. Low numbers may cause shrub spam.
adorablehamsterpets.main.wildGreenBeanBu: 1 in X chunks. Low numbers may cause shrub spam.
adorablehamsterpets.main.worldGenMisc.de: For The Aspiring Landscape Artist. Note: Most of these settings require re-logging into your world to take effect, and it's unlikely you will see changes in chunks that have already been generated.
adorablehamsterpets.main.yeetSettings.de: For when you need a furry, surprisingly aerodynamic solution.
advancements.adorablehamsterpets.husband: Your hamster successfully sniffed out diamonds! Wow! This mod is amazing!
Canine Aspirations?
That special Food Mix did the trick! Your hamster now deems you worthy of its cheek-based cargo services.
A Trustworthy Face
Those cheeks are at maximum capacity. Your hamster is either preparing for the apocalypse or just really, really likes snacks.
Chipmunk Aspirations
Transform a humble cucumber into Sliced Cucumber. Rodents go nuts for it.
The Bait
Whip up some Hamster Food Mix. This is a great opportunity to say 'peckish.' What a fun word.
Pocket Snacks
Procure Green Bean Seeds. These aren't your average beans.
Green Bean Gardener
That high-pitched noise wasn't your tinnitus. Your hamster thinks a Creeper fancies you. Run. Or don't. Your funeral.
Impending Doom Squeak
Your shoulder-mounted alarm system just detected... something shiny. Or possibly just lint. Good luck.
Nose for Treasure
You've subjected your hamster to floral... decor. Um, good job? Should you regret this aesthetic choice, a pair of shears might be key.
Petal Pusher
Your hamster, displaying remarkable self-preservation, raided its own cheek stash. Clever, or just really hungry?
Pocket Paramedic
Welcome to your new life as a rodent enthusiast. We won't judge.
The Hamster Life
Acquire Cucumber Seeds. The first step to gaining a tiny, squeaky companion.
Seed Money
Convince a hamster that your shoulder is prime real estate. Hint: Cheese helps.
Shoulder Surfer
Cook up some Green Beans. They smell... suspiciously energizing.
Steamy Greens
Gather Sunflower Seeds. They look innocent, but they're part of a larger, fluffier scheme.
Sunflower Hoarder
Feed your hamster Steamed Green Beans and witness a temporary burst of... ambition.
Supercharged Squeaker
Successfully domesticate a wild hamster. May your ankles be ever safe.
A Furry Shadow
Unleash your shoulder trebuchet. Bonus points for direct Creeper hits. (No hamsters were *terminally harmed in the making of this feature.)
The Hamster Yeet™
advancements.adorablehamsterpets.recipes: Learned how to craft the Hamster Guide Book.
advancements.adorablehamsterpets.technic: You've crafted the sacred texts of hamster lore. Well done.
block.adorablehamsterpets.sunflower_bloc: Sometimes yields seeds... key recipe ingredients?
Requires time to replenish its seedy bounty.
block.adorablehamsterpets.wild_cucumber_: Drops seeds. Seeds that might help you make small friends.
Interact with it. Gently. It's sensitive.
block.adorablehamsterpets.wild_green_bea: Yields seeds. Seeds for... enhancement of certain small mammals.
book.adorablehamsterpets.page1.body:
So, you want hamsters?

An admirable, if slightly predictable, goal.

This guide contains dubious wisdom gleaned from watching small rodents. Use at your own risk.
book.adorablehamsterpets.page10.body1: If its healthy, the same basic food might trigger...
book.adorablehamsterpets.page10.body2: . Find another hamster also in Love Mode. Stand back. Nature happens.
book.adorablehamsterpets.page11.body1: Do not feed it the same mundane item twice in a row. It has standards. It will refuse.
book.adorablehamsterpets.page12.body2: ? (Smelt regular Green Beans). They grant Speed, Strength, Absorption & Regen for a bit. Impressive!
book.adorablehamsterpets.page12.body3: ...But there is a cooldown before it works again. Less impressive.
book.adorablehamsterpets.page13.body1: Inventory... in their face. Feed epic snack to earn trust... and cheek access. Then
book.adorablehamsterpets.page13.body2: a tamed hamster for 6 slots of prime real estate.
book.adorablehamsterpets.page13.body3: If hurt, it can automatically eat
book.adorablehamsterpets.page14.body2: ? Try right-clicking your hamster with them. It's called fashion, look it up. Click again to undo your questionable style choices. No refunds on the petals.
book.adorablehamsterpets.page15.body2: . Wave it with intent near your tamed companion. Things might happen. (You can also eat the cheese. It's suspiciously nourishing and slips right down the old gullet, if you can stomach the... moist sounds.)
book.adorablehamsterpets.page16.body1: Your shoulder companion may alert you to nearby
book.adorablehamsterpets.page16.body2: that have noticed you, or shiny
book.adorablehamsterpets.page16.body3: . Listen for the unique squeaks and sniffs amongst your own panicked breathing.
book.adorablehamsterpets.page17.body2: has targeted YOU. Not just nearby,
book.adorablehamsterpets.page17.body4: Maybe your hamster is worried its comfy shoulder perch is about to vanish.
book.adorablehamsterpets.page18.body1: Those excited sniffs? Your pocket prospector smells
book.adorablehamsterpets.page18.body3: It pauses between alerts, so listen carefully before you start digging... again.
book.adorablehamsterpets.page19.body2: from your shoulder? Try letting your fuzzy friend down while it's still got the scent.
book.adorablehamsterpets.page19.body3: If it was really onto something, it might just decide to lead you to the jackpot.
book.adorablehamsterpets.page2.body1: First, you need bait. The good stuff comes from
book.adorablehamsterpets.page2.body3: in warmer places - plains, savannas, maybe jungle edges. Right-click 'em for seeds.
book.adorablehamsterpets.page20.body1: For when words fail and you need a furry, surprisingly aerodynamic solution. Aim (don't stare right at a block), press
book.adorablehamsterpets.page20.body2: (or your chosen keybind of yeeting). Effective against Creepers. Hamster passes out upon impact. Go console it.
book.adorablehamsterpets.page21.body2: not throwing your hamster? Did you add this mod to an existing world? Woopsy.
book.adorablehamsterpets.page22.body: Not a fan of earning your hamster's trust for cheek storage? Wish those tooltips would just vanish? Good news for the micromanagers: this mod is highly configurable. Tweak to your heart's content. Or break everything. Your call.
book.adorablehamsterpets.page23.body1: Shocking. Craft another with a vanilla
book.adorablehamsterpets.page23.body3: . Don't ask why Sliced Cucumber. It's a long story involving a very particular hamster and an unfortunate picnic incident.
book.adorablehamsterpets.page23.header: Misplaced this invaluable tome of rodent wisdom?
book.adorablehamsterpets.page3.body1: sometimes yield seeds on right-click. They regrow eventually.
book.adorablehamsterpets.page3.body2: If one seems barren, it might just be an old chunk - try finding one in an area you haven't explored.
book.adorablehamsterpets.page4.body2: on farmland. Once grown, harvest the
book.adorablehamsterpets.page4.body4: Now, the crucial step: craft the cucumber into
book.adorablehamsterpets.page4.body5: . This is what the little fuzzballs actually want.
book.adorablehamsterpets.page5.body: Beyond this page lie spoilers. If you prefer blissful ignorance, turn back now. Or don't. I'm a book, not your conscience.
book.adorablehamsterpets.page6.body1: Word on the block is, hamsters adapt. Expect different fur stylings depending on where they originated. Some coats are more...
book.adorablehamsterpets.page6.body3: Breeding can sometimes result in new white markings.
book.adorablehamsterpets.page7.body4: . Approach slowly. Hope it doesn't notice your desperation. Repeat until furry friend acquired.
book.adorablehamsterpets.page8.body2: Right-click your tamed hamster to make it
book.adorablehamsterpets.page8.body3: . It might fall asleep. Right-click again to resume the stalking.
book.adorablehamsterpets.page9.body1: If your hamster has had a disagreement with, well, anything, feed it
book.adorablehamsterpets.page9.body4: (sunflower seeds, pumpkin seeds, carrot, wheat seeds).
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.autoHeal: The specific items a hamster will eat directly from its cheek pouch to heal itself when injured. Keep it exclusive, or let them feast on enchanted apples. Your call.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.breeding: Hamsters need their space. (20 ticks = 1 s)
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.buffFood: The list of questionable substances that grant your hamster temporary superpowers. By default, it's just steamed green beans.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.cheeseHe: Cheese... the gooey wonder. Some people think it's overpowered. I disagree. Obviously.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.cheeseNu: How many little hunger shanks the cheese restores. Vanilla cooked steak is 8. I know you're thinking of moving it to 20, you monster.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.cheeseSa: How long the hunger effect lasts. Cooked steak is 0.8. Don't get too crazy. Or do. I'm not your conscience.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.cleaning: How often a sitting hamster gets the sudden urge to clean. It's a 1-in-X chance per tick, so lower numbers mean a higher chance for cleaning. For example, 1200 means on average, it'll clean about once a minute. 300 ≈ every 15 secs, and 5000 ≈ every 4 mins. Congratulations— now you know enough to be dangerous.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.combat.d: Squeak-first, ask questions later. Dial in the rodent kung fu.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.cooldown: Mandatory hamster union breaks between heroic stunts.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.core.des: Fundamental hamster hijinks— fiddle at your own risk.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.cucumber: Specific biome IDs where cucumbers can sprout. Format: 'mod_id:biome_name', for example: 'minecraft:savanna'.
Convention tags for maximum mod-pack harmony. Format: 'c:tag_name', for example: 'c:is_temperate'.
Biomes where cucumbers are absolutely NOT allowed. Overrides everything else. Format: 'mod_id:biome_name', for example: 'minecraft:ocean'.
Wild cucumbers, for when you need emergency salads in the savanna. Only changes fresh chunks.
Biome tags where cucumbers feel at home. Format: 'mod_id:tag_name', for example: 'minecraft:is_jungle'.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.diamondP: Probability (0.1 to 1.0) a hamster will succumb to temptation. High by default. You shouldn't leave your diamonds lying around anyway.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.diamondS: How far a hamster scans once it’s decided to play prospector.
For when your hamster develops a taste for the finer things in life. Can be configured so they steal any item— even from other mods, but they only steal diamonds by default.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.dismount: Determines the sequence for dismounting hamsters with a key press. LIFO (Last-In, First-Out) dismounts the most recently added hamster. FIFO (First-In, First-Out) dismounts the oldest one.
Choose whether a single press or a quick double‑tap dismounts the hamster.
Choose what action dismounts the hamster. 'SNEAK_KEY' uses your sneak key, obviously. 'CUSTOM_KEYBIND' uses a separate key you must set in Controls > Key Binds.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.doubleTa: Max time between sneak key presses to count as a double-tap. (20 ticks = 1 second)
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.enableAu: Hand-delivers the sacred texts on first login. Read it—or don’t. I'm not your conscience.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.enableDi: Permits hamsters to engage in spontaneous, high-stakes games of keep-away with your valuables. A chase ensues. Obviously.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.enableDy: If true, hamsters on your shoulder will randomly cycle through standing, sitting, and laying down while on the shoulder. If false, they will remain in a single state defined below.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.enableHa: Do we yeet the hamster? ('G' by default).
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.enableIn: Force a cool-down after striking it rich. Off by default, since this can't happen again anyway without another mount/dismount on the shoulder.
Permit hamsters to embark on solo get-rich-quick schemes?
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.enableIt: Helpful whispers on what the heck that cucumber is for.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.enableJa: More stats than anyone asked for. Defaults to off—mercifully.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.enableRa: Should Ravagers, the hulking beasts of destruction, flee in terror from a tiny ball of fluff? Yes. Yes, they should.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.enableSh: May save your inventory. Or your ears.
Because who doesn’t enjoy unsolicited financial advice from a rodent?
Little status mumbles when your co-pilot disembarks.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.enableSp: Turns your hamster into a mobile arachnid-repellent unit. Highly effective.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.excludeB: A list of specific biome IDs to NEVER allow spawns in, even if they match a tag. This overrides all other settings. Format: 'mod_id:biome_name'. For example, 'minecraft:plains'.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.foodHeal: Nutrition— isn't it wonderful. Tweaks to snacks.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.forceLay: If true, shoulder hamsters will be forced into their 'laying down' animation while you sprint, as if holding on for dear life. If false, they will continue their normal animation cycle.
False by default. If true, shoulder hamsters will be forced into their 'laying down' animation when you move, as if trying not to fall off. If false, they will continue their normal animation cycle.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.forcedSh: If dynamic animations are disabled, choose the single state shoulder pets should remain in. Sometimes this setting can have a delay before kicking in, but if it doesn't seem to be working at all, try switching the 'Forced State' from one option to another. Usually this just makes it "work." I'm not sure why lol
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.giveGuid: Misplaced your invaluable tome of rodent wisdom? Click here. I won't tell anyone.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.goldMist: The probability (0.0 to 1.0) that a hamster will seek gold instead of diamond, if both are available. At 0.5, it's a coin toss. At 1.0, it's guaranteed hamster sulking.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.greenBea: Extra fluff padding for those daring dives.
Because someone has to go fast.
Steamed beans: power that fades faster than your attention span.
Nutrition, but make it dramatic. Tweaks to caffeine-bean highs.
Specific biomes where beans sprout like gossip in chat. Format: 'mod_id:biome_name', for example: 'minecraft:swamp'.
Convention tags for mod-friendly bean spam. Format: 'c:tag_name', for example: 'c:is_wet'.
Absolutely no beans here, thank you very much. Overrides all other settings. Format: 'mod_id:biome_name', for example: 'minecraft:beach'.
Legumes with attitude. Tuned for that perfect mid-game caffeine hit. Only changes fresh chunks.
Biome tags for bean growth. Empty by default—choose wisely. Format: 'mod_id:tag_name', for example: 'minecraft:is_jungle'.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.hamsterF: Healing amount from Hamster Food Mix. The good stuff.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.hamsterT: Time-out after using your living projectile. (20 ticks = 1 s)
Damage dealt by thrown hamster. Surprisingly effective against Creepers. How convenient.
The base throw speed of your furry projectile.
The throw speed of your furry projectile when under the influence of Steamed Green Beans. Goes from 'yeet' to 'yote'.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.helpAndR: Buttons to press when you're lost, bored, or have found a bug that isn't just a hamster exhibiting existential angst.
Misplaced your invaluable tome of rodent wisdom? Click here. I won't tell anyone.
Join 'The Hamster Pouch' official Discord server. A place to share screenshots, get support, or just witness the ongoing development chaos. You're invited.
Found a game-breaking issue? Or a hamster phasing through the floor? Let me know on Github. The more details, the better. And believe it or not, I do check this frequently.
Shameless plug for my other, less-rodent-focused work. Click if you dare.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.includeB: A list of specific biome IDs to ALWAYS allow spawns in, even if they don't match the tags above. Format: 'mod_id:biome_name'. For example, 'minecraft:plains'.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.independ: Unleash free-range prospectors. What could go wrong?
Cooldown before your hamster can go on another treasure hunt. (20 ticks = 1 s)
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.itemTags: For the advanced user who looks at a perfectly functional system and thinks, 'I can make this weirder.' Edit these lists to change what items your hamsters consider food, bait, treasure, and all other interactions. Use item IDs (e.g., 'minecraft:diamond') or tags (e.g., '#minecraft:fishes'). Mess it up? That's a you problem.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.joinDisc: Join 'The Hamster Pouch' official Discord server. A place to share screenshots, get support, or just witness the ongoing development chaos. You're invited.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.maxFleeD: The maximum distance before the hamster gets bored and stops running to taunt you.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.maxGroup: Maximum hamsters per spawn group. Because sometimes one just isn't cute enough.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.maxSteal: The longest your cardio session can last before the hamster's attention span gives out.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.meleeDam: Tamed hamster melee damage. Mostly for show, let's be honest.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.minSteal: The shortest amount of time the hamster will entertain this little game before getting bored and dropping your stuff.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.mobInter: Configure how hamsters interact with (or terrify) other creatures.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.pouchAll: A specific list of items and tags that are allowed in the hamster's cheek pouch. You can add things to this list to bypass the default 'no tools or big blocks' rule, since this overrides the 'disallowed' settings.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.pouchDis: A list of specific item IDs that are NEVER allowed in the cheek pouch, unless they are on the 'Allowed' list above. Mostly stuff that's too big, too pointy, or just plain illogical. Lol.
A list of item tags that are NEVER allowed in the cheek pouch, unless they are on the 'Allowed' list above. A broad-spectrum approach to preventing your hamster from swallowing an entire sword.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.pouchRes: Fine-tune exactly what your hamster is (and isn't) allowed to carry. The 'Allowed' list acts as a high-priority override to the 'Disallowed' lists and general rules.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.pouchUnl: The one-time offering required to earn a hamster's ultimate trust, unlocking their cheek inventory. Make it something special. Or don't. See if I care.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.repeatab: Items on this list are so delicious, your hamster will never refuse them, even if you feed it to them twice. For the truly spoiled rodent.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.reportBu: Found a game-breaking issue? Or a hamster phasing through the floor? Let me know on Github. The more details, the better. And believe it or not, I do check this frequently.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.requireF: Require Food Mix to Unlock Cheeks
Gate cheek-pouch storage behind gourmet cuisine, because drama.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.shoulder: Change how the fuzzy parrot of doom whispers danger—and diamonds—into your ear.
Control how lively your shoulder-mounted companions are. I mean, I don't like to toot my own horn or anything, but this is pretty great. Now please excuse me while I bask in my humility.
For when the squeaks become... a bit much.
Just the basic stuff. You know, detecting creepers, sniffing diamonds. Just average Minecraft stuff really. No big deal. Why are you clapping and squealing? Stop that. You look silly.
How close you need to be before the squeak says "bling."
Here's where you decide how to get the little rascals off your shoulders. Warning: they can be clingy.
The maximum time (in seconds) a shoulder hamster will stay in any one animation state (standing, sitting, or laying down). A random duration between the min and max is chosen for each transition.
The minimum time (in seconds) a shoulder hamster will stay in any one animation state (standing, sitting, or laying down). A random duration between the min and max is chosen for each transition.
The specific item that convinces a tamed hamster your shoulder is the best seat in the house. Defaults to cheese, because of course it does.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.silenceP: Mutes the hamster landing/bounce sound effect from the physics simulation when you are in first-person view.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.silenceS: Mutes the ambient squeaks from shoulder-mounted hamsters. The bounce and alert sounds will still play.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.spawnBio: A list of 'c:' convention biome tags where hamsters can spawn. Used for broad mod compatibility. By default, this includes most overworld tags as a 'catch-all', and the filtering for different hamster variants in each biome is hard coded.
A list of biome tags where hamsters can spawn. Format: 'mod_id:tag_name'. For example, 'minecraft:is_forest'.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.spawnWei: Adjusts hamster spawn frequency. Higher = more chaos. 1 = blissful silence.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.standard: Healing from basic seeds/crops. Better than nothing… probably.
The hamster's everyday menu. These items will heal them or, if they're at full health, might give them... ideas about starting a family. Don't make it weird.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.stealCoo: Mandatory time-out after a successful heist to prevent serial kleptomania. (20 ticks = 1s). WARNING: Increasing this cooldown can dramatically change the diamond stealing mechanic, since that AI goal sometimes re-runs multiple times in a row when the hamster has trouble pathfinding to the item that it wants to steal. So instead of increasing this, you should probably just stop dropping your diamonds on the ground everywhere, butter fingers.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.stealabl: A list of item IDs hamsters find irresistible. Format: 'mod_id:item_id'. Example: 'minecraft:diamond'.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.steamedG: When the sugar rush ends, force a breather. (20 ticks = 1 s)
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.sunflowe: A list of biome tags where these custom Sunflowers can replace vanilla ones. The 'c:is_plains' tag provides wide compatibility with modded biomes.
Specific biome IDs where these sunflowers can replace the vanilla ones. Format: 'mod_id:biome_name'. They’re picky.
Higher = slower, lower = faster. Makes perfect sense.
Custom sunflowers, because the vanilla ones just weren’t fabulous enough. Only changes fresh chunks.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.tamedQui: Maximum seconds before the inevitable deep snooze.
Minimum seconds before a sitting hamster gets sleepy.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.tamedSle: Even digital rodents need beauty sleep— adjust according to your patience levels.
How close a hostile mob can get before a hamster wakes up from it's power nap.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.tamingAn: Convince a hamster to love you—and occasionally accept a roommate.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.tamingCh: Taming difficulty (1 in X chance). Higher = more cucumbers sacrificed to fuzzy freeloaders.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.tamingFo: The official list of bribes for convincing wild fluffballs to join your cause. By default, it's just sliced cucumbers. Feel free to add 'minecraft:nether_star' if you enjoy making poor life choices. Compatible with Cultural Delights by default!
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.useHampt: Changes the default entity name from 'Hamster' to 'Hampter'. Note: This has no visible effect in vanilla Minecraft, as mobs don't show nameplates by default. It's primarily for use with mods like Auto Leveling that display entity names.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.visitWeb: Shameless plug for my other, less-rodent-focused work. Click if you dare.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.wildBush: Higher = slower, lower = faster. Still makes perfect sense.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.wildCucu: 1 in X chunks. Low numbers may cause shrub spam.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.wildGree: 1 in X chunks. Low numbers may cause shrub spam.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.worldGen: For The Aspiring Landscape Artist. Note: Most of these settings require re-logging into your world to take effect, and it's unlikely you will see changes in chunks that have already been generated.
config.adorablehamsterpets.main.yeetSett: For when you need a furry, surprisingly aerodynamic solution.
item.adorablehamsterpets.hamster_guide_b: §f§lHamster Tips:§r§6§o Guidebook to the Tiny, Furry Heart§r
message.adorablehamsterpets.baby_throw_r: Your baby hamster clings tightly, refusing to become a furry cannonball. Perhaps wait until it's older?
message.adorablehamsterpets.beans_cooldo: Your hamster hasn't calmed down enough from last time yet. (%d min %d sec left).
message.adorablehamsterpets.cheek_pouch_: This hamster's cheek pouches are currently shy. A gourmet meal might change its mind...
message.adorablehamsterpets.creeper_dete: Your hamster senses a creeper approaching!
message.adorablehamsterpets.diamond_near: Your hamster smells diamond ore nearby.
message.adorablehamsterpets.dismount.2: Your furry co-pilot has touched down.
message.adorablehamsterpets.dismount.3: Shoulder vacant. The hamster has other plans.
message.adorablehamsterpets.dismount.4: Hamster deployed. Or it just fancied a walk.
message.adorablehamsterpets.dismount.5: One less passenger. Your hamster is now free-range.
message.adorablehamsterpets.dismount.6: The hamster returns to terrestrial navigation.
message.adorablehamsterpets.food_refusal: Hamster wants to try something different.
message.adorablehamsterpets.found_gold_m: Your hamster has located what is technically a valuable mineral. Just not the one it was hoping for. Awkward.
Your hamster proudly presents... gold. It gets a participation trophy for effort.
With unwavering confidence, your hamster has located something shiny. It's just... the wrong shiny.
There's a moment of dawning horror as your hamster realizes this is not, in fact, diamond.
Well... it §ois§r treasure... technically. Your hamster, however, seems to disagree with this assessment.
The epic quest for riches concludes with... gold. Your hamster has begun to contemplate its life choices.
So close, and yet so... gold. The disappointment is palpable.
message.adorablehamsterpets.shoulder_mou: Your hamster scurries onto your shoulder!
message.adorablehamsterpets.sweet_potato: Sweet Potato? An inspired name. Very well.
message.adorablehamsterpets.throw_cooldo: Your hamster needs a break— try again in %d minute and %d seconds.
message.adorablehamsterpets.throwing_dis: Hamster throwing is disabled in config.
tooltip.adorablehamsterpets.cheese.apple: This old version's AppleSkin HUD can't handle my dynamic stats, so if you changed the config, the HUD is just... aspirational.
tooltip.adorablehamsterpets.cheese.hint1: A culinary masterpiece. Irresistible to small, furry opportunists.
tooltip.adorablehamsterpets.cheese.hint2: Wave it around in front of a hamster and see what happens.
tooltip.adorablehamsterpets.cucumber.hin: Try preparing it at a crafting table...
tooltip.adorablehamsterpets.cucumber_see: Grow cucumbers. Cucumbers that might... persuade?
Just add water, soil, and existential dread.
tooltip.adorablehamsterpets.green_bean_s: Plant these to grow beans. Beans that empower...
Requires commitment. And maybe some dirt.
A simple veggie. Can be cooked for... interesting results.
Eat them raw if you enjoy disappointment.
tooltip.adorablehamsterpets.hamster_food: So good, even the pickiest hamster can't refuse.
Use it when they're being difficult. Or just hungry.
tooltip.adorablehamsterpets.hamster_guid: Can be crafted with Sliced Cucumber and a Book.
tooltip.adorablehamsterpets.sliced_cucum: The key to a tiny, furry heart. Or at least, their attention.
A gentle, sneaky approach might be required.
tooltip.adorablehamsterpets.steamed_gree: Gives hamsters a sudden burst of... enthusiasm?
The effect isn't permanent. Nothing ever is, except taxes.
tooltip.adorablehamsterpets.sunflower_se: Apparently important for certain food mixes.
Can also be used as a basic snack.
